mapper.select: SELECT tam.ACCOUNT_ID accountId, tam.USER_NAME userName, tam.LOGIN_EMAIL loginEmail, tam.LOGIN_PW loginPw FROM tb_account_main tam WHERE tam.LOGIN_EMAIL = #{loginEmail};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_account_main( USER_NAME, LOGIN_EMAIL, LOGIN_PW, NICK_NAME, PHONE_NUM, GENDER ) VALUE ( #{account.userName}, #{account.loginEmail}, #{account.loginPw}, #{account.nickName}, #{account.phoneNum}, #{account.gender} );
